title: Kuala Lumpur Glenmarie District Hotel with Rooftop Bar & Pool
description:
Situated in the thriving district of Glenmarie, this modern hotel offers a tranquil break from the rhythm of Malaysia's energetic capital. Discover the region's rich heritage with a visit to the nearby Sultan Salahuddin Abdul Aziz Shah Mosque, or indulge in retail therapy at the Subang Parade Shopping Centre.

Savour authentic Malaysian cuisine and Western classics at the hotel's restaurant, Warna, sip cocktails above the crowd at Urban@13 Rooftop Bar then enjoy a refreshing dip in the adjacent saltwater pool, offering panoramic views of the surrounding cityscape.
offer_address: Jalan Kontraktor U1 14 Seksyen U1, Shah Alam, Selangor, Malaysia, 40150
